dash_welcome_sub: Ready to make 1% progress today? Manage your habits, schedule, and finances all in one place.
dash_habit_desc: Track your daily habits and build long-term consistency.
dash_planner_desc: Organize your daily tasks to stay focused and productive.
dash_finance_desc: Record expenses and income to maintain your financial health.
greet_subtitle: Focus on today. Tomorrow is another day.
